alert.note: Alert for Sierra Madre Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 18 at 3:52AM MDT until May 21 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT THURSDAY NIGHT TO NOON MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Sierra Madre Range. * WHEN...From midnight Thursday night to noon MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Outdoor recreation could become life threatening to those caught unprepared for winter conditions. Hikers and snowmobilers may become disoriented. Frostbite and hypothermia can develop quickly. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
